summary: Grelod's true identity is finally revealed! She is a witch.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][color=#b6b6b6]Greetings, fellow Skyrim lovers! [/color]

[/size][size=3]Everybody hates Grelod, I'm sure. She isn't kind, in contradiction to her name, so I have thought about transforming her into a witch.

[/size][color=#ffff00][b][size=4]What have you changed at Grelod?[/size]

[/b][/color][size=3]Firstly, I have changed her apparel. Secondly, she fights you when you attack her. For more fun, don't sneak attack her. You'll see that she'll use spells.[/size]

[size=4][color=#ffff00]Are there any problems with this mod I should think about?[/color]

[/size][size=3]There might be problems with it, as I didn't manage to test it enough. If you find any bugs, please let me know and I'll try to fix them ASAP.[/size]

[color=#93c47d][size=5][b]I haven't added any pictures, because I want it to be surprise. You can add a few if you want. I don't mind.[/b][/size][/color]


[color=#ff0000][size=5]Also check out:[/size][/color]
[size=4][u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61247/?]Daughters Of Dibella
[/url][/u][/size]
[size=4][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68146]BLMM - Better Looking Marriageable Men[/url][/u][/size]
[color=#d5a6bd]
[/color][size=5][color=#d5a6bd]Have fun! ☺[/color]
[/size]

[i][size=3]jodidovahkiin[/size][/i]
author: jodidovahkiin
